title: Morgan Health CEO Mendelson on Health-Care Trends, Outlook
description: Morgan Health CEO Dan Mendelson joined Bloomberg's Katie Greifeld at the annual JP Morgan Healthcare Conference on Jan. 14 in San Francisco to talk about trying to keep costs down for patients and investments they are making.  (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Morgan Health CEO Dan Mendelson joined Bloomberg's Katie Greifeld at the annual JP Morgan Healthcare Conference on Jan. 14 in San Francisco to talk about trying to keep costs down for patients and investments they are making.  (Source: Bloomberg)
